data.title: THE REVOLUTION BUSINESS: BOOK FIVE OF MERCHANT PRINCES: BOOK FIVE OF THE MERCHANT PRINCES
data.meta_description: New York: Tor, 2009 . Octavo, boards. First edition. Fifth book of the Merchant Princes series, preceded by THE FAMILY TRADE, THE HIDDEN FAMILY, THE CLAN CORPORATE and THE MERCHANT'S WAR. A series praised in an essay by Nobel Prize-winning economist Paul Krugman as great fun and economic science fiction worth reading. Mild corner creases to two text leaves, else a fine copy in fine dust jacket. #154042
data.text:
Stross, Charles. THE REVOLUTION BUSINESS: BOOK FIVE OF MERCHANT PRINCES: BOOK FIVE OF THE MERCHANT PRINCES. New York: Tor, [2009]. Octavo, boards. First edition. Fifth book of the "Merchant Princes" series, preceded by THE FAMILY TRADE, THE HIDDEN FAMILY, THE CLAN CORPORATE and THE MERCHANT'S WAR. A series praised in an essay by Nobel Prize-winning economist Paul Krugman as great fun and economic science fiction worth reading. Mild corner creases to two text leaves, else a fine copy in fine dust jacket. (#154042).

Price: $25.00
